briefTitle: Revefenacin Peak Inspiratory Flow Rate (PIFR) Study in COPD
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Randomized, Double-Blind, Double-Dummy, Parallel-Group, Study to Compare Once Daily Nebulized Revefenacin With Spiriva Once Daily Delivered Via the HandiHaler® on Lung Function in Subjects With COPD and a Low PIFR
summary: This study is a randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, parallel group study to compare once daily nebulized Revefenacin with Spiriva once daily delivered via the HandiHaler® on lung function in subjects with COPD and a Low Peak Inspiratory Flow Rate.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Trough FEV1 on Day 29
